context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz could do is to
generation: speak to the doctor or pharmacist about possible alternative medications that are covered by insurance or are less expensive
apply for medical grants or loans, negotiate with the pharmacy or drug manufacturer for a lower price, start a fundraising campaign, or explore generic alternatives of the medication
seek financial assistance from various sources such as friends, relatives, or local charities
apply for financial aid or seek help from charitable organizations
seek assistance from local nonprofits, churches, or organizations dedicated to helping individuals with their medical expenses

seek assistance from various sources such as crowdfunding platforms, donations from friends, family or community groups, health charities or non-profit organizations that provide financial aid for medical needs
seek financial assistance or fundraise
apply for medical financial assistance programs
seek help from fundraising platforms like GoFundMe, reach out to charities or pharmaceutical companies that may have programs for patients who can't afford their medications
reach out to the pharmaceutical company directly to see if they offer any patient assistance programs or discounted prices for those who can't afford their medications

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to
generation: call for a taxi, an Uber, or a Lyft
call a taxi, an Uber, or similar ride-share service to get him to the airport as quickly as possible
call a taxi, an Uber, or some other ride share service
call for a taxi, rideshare service, or roadside assistance to either fix his car quickly or more likely take him directly to the airport
call for a taxi or an Uber to take him to the airport
call a taxi or an Uber to pick him up from his current location and take him to the airport
call a taxi or book an Uber/Lyft to take him the rest of the way to the airport
call a taxi or use a ride-sharing app to book a ride to the airport
call a taxi or a rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or any reliable ride-hailing service to get him to the airport as quickly as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. use his own money to make up for the missing amount
put his own money in the register to replace the missing amount

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary could do is to
generation: explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the assignment
email or call her mom to bring the assignment to school if possible before class starts
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for permission to turn in the assignment the next day after retrieving it from home
try to explain the situation to her teacher and ask for extra time to submit the homework
email or contact her teacher to explain the situation and ask for a brief extension to turn in the homework
ask her teacher for an extension or the chance to turn in the assignment the next day, so she can retrieve her homework from home
email her teacher explaining the situation and ask if she could turn in the assignment the following day
call or text her mom, asking her to bring the assignment to school if possible
contact her teacher and explain the situation
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for the possibility of an extension to submit the assignment

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: start making an SOS signal with rocks on a clear patch of land, which might be spotted by a search helicopter
start a fire
start a fire using dry twigs and leaves; the fire would not only provide warmth but also signal their location to any potential rescue teams in the vicinity
create a signal to attract attention
start a fire to keep them warm in the night and to melt snow for drinking water
build a shelter with available resources to retain body heat and provide protection from the elements
create a signal fire which will create smoke that could be seen from a great distance
start creating a signal for help

look for a stream or river for a source of water, try to forage for edible plants or hunt small animals, build a shelter to protect themselves from the elements, and create a signal fire to attract the attention of potential rescuers

start rationing out the remaining food and water amongst the group to last longer while also trying to gather additional resources from the environment, such as collecting rainwater, foraging for edible plants or catching fish
